title: Who's watching the eclipse today?
body:
I'm watching the live stream on [nasa's youtube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wwMDvPCGeE0).  Anyone else going to watch it live?

BTW, if you are in totality take your solar glasses off during the 2 minutes of darkness and put them back on **once a sliver of sunlight returns.**  When the sun makes a "diamond ring" effect, you know it's time to go back to the glasses/pinhole method.
